ObjectiveFront: \ul Deploy Jakku system and Niima Outpost Shipyard (with [Episode VII] Falcon there). May deploy Graveyard Of Giants.\ul0 \par \b For remainder of game\b0, you may not deploy Luke or Jedi. Your Destiny is suspended. Opponent's [Reflections II] objective targets Rey instead of Luke. While Rey at a battleground site, Visage Of The Emperor is suspended. \par \b While this side up\b0, once per turn, may deploy a Jakku location from reserve deck, reshuffle. \par \b Flip\b0  this card if you control Jakku system and occupy two Jakku battleground sites (or vice versa).
ObjectiveBack: \b While\b0  this side up, once per turn, may deploy a Jakku location from reserve deck, reshuffle. Once during opponent's control phase, if you control two Jakku battlegrounds and are about to lose Force, may reduce that Force loss to 1 (may not be further reduced). Once per battle involving your Resistance character, may subtract 2 from a just drawn destiny. While with Han, your [Episode VII] characters and [Episode VII] starships are defense value +2. \par \b Flip\b0  this card if you do not occupy two battlegrounds.
Information: Original cards: Visored Vision (front), Tight Squeeze (back).\par \par This card has an [Episode VII] icon.

Lore: The Millennium Falcon's well-known reputation is favorable not only for its captain and first mate, but for the Alliance as well.
Gametext: May not be placed in Reserve Deck. If Falcon about to leave table, place it out of play. May add 2 pilots and 2 passengers. Has ship-docking capability. While [Episode VII] Han or Rey piloting, maneuver +2 and immune to attrition < 4 (< 6 if both). Once during your move phase, if at a site, may flip this card (even if unpiloted).
Icons: Scomp Link, Astromech, Resistance, Episode VII
Information: Original card: Legendary Starfighter.\par \par This card has an [Episode VII] and a Resistance icon.\par \par Millennium Falcon personas are:\par \par Gold Squadron 1\par [Han, Chewie, And The Falcon]\par [Han, Chewie, And The Falcon (V)]\par Lando In Millennium Falcon\par Millennium Falcon\par The Falcon\par The Falcon, Junkyard Garbage (Starship)\par The Falcon, Junkyard Garbage (Vehicle)\par -----\par Surface Defense Cannon deploys free aboard Millennium Falcon.
Matching: Artoo & Threepio\par Captain Han Solo\par Chewbacca\par Chewbacca, Protector\par Chewie (V)\par General Solo\par Han Solo\par Rey\par Solo

Lore: Han's "special modifications" for the Millennium Falcon included security mechanisms, deflector shields, hull plating, faster hyperdrive and enhanced weapons. Enclosed.
Gametext: May not be placed in Reserve Deck. If Falcon about to leave table, place it out of play. May add 2 pilots and 2 passengers. Immune to Trample and Unsalvageable, even if unpiloted. While Finn or Rey aboard, immune to attrition < 4 (< 6 if both). Once during your move phase, if piloted, may flip this card.
Information: Original Card: Special Modifications.\par \par This card has an [Episode VII] and a Resistance icon.\par --------\par Millennium Falcon personas are:\par \par Gold Squadron 1\par [Han, Chewie, And The Falcon]\par [Han, Chewie, And The Falcon (V)]\par Lando In Millennium Falcon\par Millennium Falcon\par The Falcon\par The Falcon, Junkyard Garbage (Starship)\par The Falcon, Junkyard Garbage (Vehicle)\par -----\par Surface Defense Cannon deploys free aboard Millennium Falcon.
Matching: Artoo & Threepio\par Captain Han Solo\par Chewbacca\par Chewbacca, Protector\par Chewie (V)\par General Solo\par Han Solo\par Rey\par Solo
Rules: (Errata) The game text 'even if unpiloted' added.

Lore: Experienced \b smuggler\b0  from Ord Mantell. Piloted Red 10 at the Battle of Yavin.  Long-time wingman of Garven Dreis.
Gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots.  While at a battleground system, opponent's starships may not 'cloak.' May lose 1 Force (free if piloting Red 10) to cancel a just-drawn weapon destiny targeting a starship he is piloting.

Lore: Frequently escorts Mon Calamari star cruisers. Personally assigned by Ackbar to main Rebel fleet. Advanced scanners continuously disrupt target acquistion signals.
Gametext: Deploys -2 to same system as any Star Cruiser. May add 3 pilots and 4 passengers. Permanent pilot provides ability of 2. Weapon destinies targeting your starships here are -2.
Information: Original concept by Jonathan Wilkerson.\par \par The only non-unique Star Cruisers are Mon Calamari Star Cruisers.

Gametext: May add Poe (or a spy) as a pilot and one passenger. Deploys free to opponent's system. While Poe piloting, maneuver +2. If Finn aboard, apply his ability towards drawing battle destiny.
Information: Original card: Lost Relay\par \par This card has an Episode VII icon.
Rules: Note that any vehicle or starship with the word 'stolen' in title is always considered to be a stolen vehicle or starship respectively, regardless of owner. Also, any card with 'Stolen' in title is still considered to be 'just stolen' whenever a player steals it.

Gametext: If [Episode VII] Falcon here, Force drain +1 here.      Imperial starships deploy +1 here.
LightSideText: If [Episode VII] Falcon here, Force drain +1 here.
Information: This card has an Episode VII icon.\par \par Original card: Sullust (Light)
IsPulled: A New Secret Base\par A New Secret Base (V)\par Hidden Base\par Mindful Of The Future\par Yavin 4 Base Operations

Gametext: Your starfighters take off and land here for free.\par Your gangsters and scavengers deploy -1 here.
LightSideText: Your starfighters take off and land here for free.
DarkSideText: Your gangsters and scavengers deploy -1 here.
Information: This card has an Episode VII icon.\par \par Original card: Tatooine: Mos Espa Docking Bay.

Gametext: At the start of your turn, may stack top card of Lost Pile face down on Graveyard Of Giants.\par Unless opponent's scavenger present, opponent's Ravager Crash Site game text is canceled.
LightSideText: At the start of your turn, may stack top card of Lost Pile face down on Graveyard Of Giants.
DarkSideText: Unless opponent's scavenger present, opponent's Ravager Crash Site game text is canceled.
Information: This card has an Episode VII icon.\par \par Original card: Tatooine: Desert (Light).
IsPulled: Mindful Of The Future  \par Old Allies/We Need Your Help

Gametext: .Once per game, may deploy Rey here from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. Rey deploys -2 here.\par
LightSideText: Once per game, may deploy Rey here from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. Rey deploys -2 here.
DarkSideText: If Rey present, she may not be targeted by weapons.
Information: This card has an Episode VII icon.\par \par Original card: Cloud City: Incinerator (Light)

Gametext: If you just deployed a scavenger here, may retrieve a device, droid or weapon.\par
LightSideText: If you just deployed a scavenger here, may retrieve a device, droid or weapon.
DarkSideText: Unless you occupy, to deploy or move your non-scavenger character here requires +1 force.
Information: This card has an Episode VII icon.\par \par Original card: Tatooine: Dune Sea
IsPulled: Mindful Of The Future  \par Old Allies/We Need Your Help

LightSideText: Lor San Tekka is power +4 and defense value -2 here.
DarkSideText: If your First Order Character here, your total power here is +2.
Information: This card has an Episode VII icon.\par \par Original card: Tatooine: Toshe Station
IsPulled: Mindful Of The Future  \par Old Allies/We Need Your Help

Gametext: If you have no Rebels on Endor, Force drain -1 here. If you control, each of opponent's biker scouts is forfeit -1.   If you have no Imperials on Endor, Force drain -1 here.
LightSideText: If you have no Rebels on Endor, Force drain -1 here. If you control, each of opponent's biker scouts is forfeit -1.
DarkSideText: If you have no Imperials on Endor, Force drain -1 here.
Information: Original concept by Steve Skilton.
IsPulled: A New Secret Base\par A New Secret Base (V)\par Hidden Base\par Mindful Of The Future\par Yavin 4 Base Operations
Combo: Endor (V) + Strike Planning\par Opponent's Force generation at Endor system is canceled unless Endor Operations on table.

Gametext: Unless you occupy Bunker (or Back Door), your characters may not deploy here.   Once per game, you may deploy Endor Shield from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.
LightSideText: Unless you occupy Bunker (or Back Door), your characters may not deploy here.
DarkSideText: Once per game, you may deploy Endor Shield from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.

Gametext: Once per game, choose: During battle, place the top card of your Lost Pile out of play to add its destiny number to your total power. OR Peek at the cards stacked on Graveyard Of Giants; take (or steal) one starfighter or vehicle there into hand.
Information: Original card: Into The Garbage Chute, Flyboy\par \par This card has an Episode VII icon.

Lore: Sarcastic, Sardonic, Irreverent. Impertinent. Exasperating. Disrespectful. Outrageous and charming. Han was a scoundrel but Leia began to realize that she loved him.
Gametext: USED: Cancel and redraw a just drawn destiny.\par LOST: A just drawn battle destiny is +3.

Lore: "But not at the expense of the moment."
Gametext: USED: If Maul just swung a lightsaber during battle, that lightsaber may not target again this battle.  LOST: If [Episode I] Obi-Wan or non-[permanent weapon] Qui-Gon is in battle with a Dark Jedi, add one battle destiny. OR Cancel Maul Strikes or The Phantom Menace.
Information: Original concept by Emil Wallin.

Lore: "Look, don't worry. Everything's gonna be fine. Trust me."
Gametext: USED: Cancel an attempt to fire a weapon during any move phase.\par LOST: If a battle was just initiated, lose 1 Force to prevent all weapons from being fired for remainder of battle.
Information: Original concept my Matthew Harrison-Trainor.
IsCanceledBy: Point Man (V) (during a battle at a site)\par

CardName: I'm Getting Pretty Good At This
Lore: Starship blaster, often slung in turret mounts to take advantage of light weight and quick targeting motions. Installed on many starships including the \ul Millennium Falcon\ul0.
Gametext: If Finn and either Poe or Rey are in a battle together, you may add two battle destiny. OR deploy Finn aboard any starship or vehicle from Reserve Deck; reshuffle
Information: Original card: Quad Laser Cannon.

Gametext: Use 1 Force to a take a dejarik into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. OR For remainder of turn, you lose no Force to Cloud City Occupation, Rebel Base Occupation, Tatooine Occupation, That Thing's Operational, or You May Start Your Landing.
Information: Original card: We're Doomed.\par \par
Pulls: Grimtaash\par Houjix\par K'lor'slug\par K'lor`slug (V)\par Mantellian Savrip

Gametext: Subtract 2 from a just drawn destiny targeting the ability or defense value of your non-Jedi [Episode VII] character. OR If you just forfeited a character from a Jakku site during your turn, use 1 Force to deploy that character from Lost Pile to same site for free.
Information: Original card: Old Ben.\par \par This card has an Episode VII icon.

Lore: "This is your arena. I feel I must return to mine."
Gametext: Deploy on table. If no senator here, you may place a senator here from hand to draw two cards from top of Reserve Deck. If an \b order\b0  or \b rebellion\b0  agenda here, once during your draw phase may place all cards on your Political Effects in Used Pile.
Information: Original card: I've decided to go back.\par \par Original concept by Kent Larsen.
IsPulled: Sanity And Compassion\par The Signal\par We Wish To Board At Once

Lore: Qui-Gon realized that sometimes it's best to just leave, before any more damage is done.
Gametext: Deploy on table. Once per game, may stack the top card of your Lost Pile beneath Credits Will Do Fine. May examine cards stacked beneath Credits Will Do Fine and place any two in owner's Lost Pile to take into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle, (or retrieve into hand) a starship. (Immune to Alter)
Information: Original concept by Stephen Morgan.
IsPulled: The Signal\par We Wish To Board At Once

Lore: High-speed collisions are a constant danger during chaotic starfighter dogfights. Scanners can be jammed. Pilots rely on vision, increasing the chances of such accidents.
Gametext: Deploy on table. Starships and vehicles just lost from Jakku locations are stacked here face down. Unless no cards here, if a player just Force drained on Jakku: that player may retrieve 1 Force (if they Force drained with a scavenger, may randomly retrieve instead), peek at cards stacked here, and then place one in owner's Lost Pile. (Immune to Alter)
IsPulled: Old Allies (at the start of the game)\par The Signal\par We Wish To Board At Once\par

Gametext: If with your other Resistance character and present at a site, adds 1 to your Force drains here and may place this character in Used Pile to cancel a just drawn weapon destiny here.

Lore: \b Smuggler\b0.
Gametext: Adds 3 to power of anything he pilots. Deploys -1 to Falcon. Draws one battle destiny if unable to otherwise. Adds one battle destiny if with Chewie or Rey. Once per game, may play an Interrupt from Lost Pile as if from hand (then place that card out of play).
Information: Original Card: Smuggler's Blues.\par \par This card has an Episode VII icon.\par \par Han Solo personas are:\par \par Captain Han Solo\par General Solo\par General Solo (V)\par Han\par Han (V)\par [Han, Chewie, And The Falcon]\par [Han, Chewie, And The Falcon (V)]\par Han Solo\par Han With Heavy Blaster Pistol\par Solo\par TK-422
Matching: Millennium Falcon\par The Falcon\par The Falcon, Junkyard Garbage
MatchingWeapon: Han's Heavy Blaster Pistol\par Han's Heavy Blaster Pistol (V)

Lore: Native of Chandrila. \b Leader\b0  of the Alliance. A former member of the Imperial Senate where she was a formidable opponent of then-Senator Palpatine. Friend of Bail Organa.
Gametext: \b Agenda\b0 : rebellion. Deploys free aboard your capital starship. Once per turn, while in a senate majority (or Stolen Data Tapes on table), may take your just drawn battle destiny into hand. Once per game, may deploy Chandrila from reserve deck; reshuffle.
IsPulled: Might Of The Republic\par Strike Planning\par Yavin 4: Massassi War Room (V)
Combo: Mon Mothma + Chandrila\par Mon Mothma deploys -2 at any Chandrila location.

Lore: Female \b scavenger\b0.
Gametext: Adds 3 to the power of anything she pilots. When deployed, may take any card from Used Pile into hand; reshuffle. Your total battle destiny here is +1. Once per turn, may draw bottom card of your Force Pile. Immune to attrition < 3 (< 6 if on Jakku).
Information: Original Card: Corellian.\par \par This card has an Episode VII icon.

Lore: \b Leader\b0.
Gametext: Adds 3 to the power of anything he pilots. Deploys -1 to Jakku. When piloting, adds one battle destiny. Anything he pilots is immune to attrition < 5.
Information: Original Card: Ben Quersey.\par \par This card has an Episode VII icon.

Lore: \b Information broker. Leader.\b0
Gametext: If you just deployed BB-8 or a Resistance leader to same or related location, may draw top card of Reserve Deck. During your control phase, one of your other Resistance characters present may make a regular move.
Information: Original Card: Commander Evram Lajaie.\par \par This card has an Episode VII icon.
IsPulled: Why Does Everyone Want To Go Back To Jakku?!

Lore: Gunner. Stormtrooper.
Gametext: Adds 3 to power of any starship or enclosed vehicle he is aboard as a passenger. May deploy as a 'react' to same location as your pilot (free if Poe or Rey). Once per game, may take Blaster Proficiency into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. Immune to attrition < 4.
Information: Original Card: Tibanna Gas Miner.\par \par This card has an Episode VII icon.
Pulls: Blaster Proficiency\par Sorry About The Mess & Blaster Proficiency
IsPulled: I'm Getting Pretty Good At This

Lore: Abednedo \b Scavenger.\b0
Gametext: Power -3 with Unkar Plutt. Once per battle, may use 1 Force to peek at cards stacked on Graveyard Of Giants; place one in owner's Lost Pile to add one destiny to total power at same or adjacent site. May take your starship just drawn for destiny into hand.
Information: Original Card: Baragwin.\par \par This card has an Episode VII icon.

Lore: Wookiee \b smuggler\b0.
Gametext: Deploys -1 to Falcon. While 'hit', draws one battle destiny if unable to otherwise. Permanent weapon is (*]Chewbacca's Bowcaster (may target a character or vehicle for free; draw two destiny; target hit, and its forfeit = 0, if total destiny > defense value).
Information: Original card: Chewie With Blaster Rifle \par \par Bossk and Zuckuss may reduce Chewbacca's forfeit to zero here.\par -----\par Chewbacca personas are:\par \par [Han, Chewie, And The Falcon]\par Chewbacca\par Chewbacca Of Kashyyyk\par Chewbacca, Protector\par Chewie With Blaster Rifle\par Chewie With Bowcaster\par Chewie\par Chewie (V)\par Chewie, Enraged\par \par Chewbacca's Bowcaster personas are:\par \par Chewie With Bowcaster\par Chewbacca's Bowcaster
IsPulled: Beldon's Eye (V)\par Life Debt\par Seeking An Audience (V)\par Wookiee Roar
Matching: Chewie's AT-ST\par Gold Squadron 1\par Lando In Millennium Falcon\par Millennium Falcon\par The Falcon\par The Falcon. Junkyard Garbage

Lore: Female Twi'lek \b leader.\b0
Gametext: Adds 3 to the power of anything she pilots. If with an Imperial (or two Rebels), adds one battle destiny. During battle, if you just drew a destiny < number of Rebels here, may cancel and redraw that destiny.
Information: Original card: Kirdo III Operative
IsPulled: This Is MY Ship!\par Yavin 4: Massassi War Room (V)

Gametext: If just forfeited from a site, opponent may capture BB-8. While a captive, adds 1 to Force drains at same site. During your control phase, if at a battleground site and present with a Resistance character, opponent loses 1 Force.
Information: Original card: Brainiac\par \par BB-8 has a variable destiny of pi or 2 pi.\par \par This card has an Episode VII icon.

Lore: Alderaanian senator and \b leader\b0.
Gametext: \b Agenda\b0 : rebellion. While in a senate majority (or Stolen Data Tapes on table), your Force drains at battlegrounds with your Alderaanian of ability < 4 are +1. While aboard a corvette, adds one battle destiny and it may not be targeted by weapons.
Information: Original card: Alderaan Operative
IsPulled: Might Of The Republic\par Yavin 4: Massassi War Room (V)

Gametext: Draws one battle destiny if unable to otherwise. Attrition against opponent is +1 here.
Information: Original card: Lift Tube.
IsPulled: A Stunning Move\par Naboo: Theed Palace Hallway\par There They Are!

Lore: Tactical officer from Dentaal. \b Leader\b0. Familiar with utilizing computer controls to lure an invading enemy into a tactically weak position.
Gametext: While at a Cloud City site, adds one to the number of Bespin locations required to cancel Dark Deal. Once per turn, if Dark Deal on table, may search your Force Pile and take one Interrupt into hand; reshuffle.
Information: Original card: Captain Bewil.

Lore: Female \b leader\b0. Stormtrooper.
Gametext: Adds one battle destiny with a stormtrooper. If you just won a battle at same or related location, may retrieve a trooper.
Information: This card has an Episode VII icon.\par \par Original card: Charming To The Last.

Gametext: Deploys -1 to same site as a First Order leader. Opponent's characters here are cumulatively defense value -1 (limit -3).
Information: This card has an Episode VII icon.\par \par Original card: Stormtrooper.
Rules: This card recieved an errata on 16.11.2016:\par http://www.starwarsccg.org/wp/current-erratas-unlimited-shields/

Lore: Stormtrooper.
Gametext: Once per turn, if with your First Order trooper, may use 1 Force to target opponent's character present (free if Finn) and make FN-2003 'hit;' for remainder of turn, target's game text is canceled and target may not fire weapons.
Information: This card has an Episode VII icon.\par \par Original card: Corporal Drazin.

Lore: \b Leader\b0 .
Gametext: Adds 3 to the power of anyting he pilots. Deploys -2 aboard Finalizer. Your First Order characters and starships are destiny +1. Once per game, may take a First Order stormtrooper into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.
Information: This card has an Episode VII icon.\par \par Original card: Captain Yorr.
Pulls: Captain Phasma\par First Order Stormtrooper\par FN-2003\par FN-2199 (Nines)
Rules: (Errata) General Hux no longer allows you to [Upload] Strategic Reserves.

Characteristics: \b Black Sun agent\b0, \b bounty hunter\b0, \b Rodian\b0
Lore: Male Rodian \b bounty hunter\b0. Sent by Jabba to capture Han. Arrogant, overconfident and not too bright. Trained by bounty hunters Nataz and Goa, who betrayed him to Thuku.
Gametext: May deploy as a 'react.' Opponent must first use 1 Force to fire a weapon at same site. Weapons fired using Sorry About The Mess must target Greedo (if possible). Nabrun Leids may not transport characters to or from here.

Lore: \b Leader\b0 .
Gametext: Adds one destiny to total power when with a First Order shuttle. While present at a battleground, Honor Of The Jedi is suspended. Whenever a player loses a battle here, that player loses 2 Force. Immune to attrition < 4.
Information: This card has an Episode VII icon.\par \par Original card: Vader's Obsession.

Lore: Imperial Governor of the Seswenna Sector. Conceived and implemented the Death Star project. A \b leader\b0  in the effort to crush the Rebellion.
Gametext: Adds 2 to the power of anything he pilots. When deployed, may draw cards from Reserve Deck until you have up to six cards in hand. During battle, if present with two ISB agents, may cancel an opponent's just drawn destiny.
Information: Tarkin personas are:\par \par Tarkin\par Tarkin (V)\par Grand Moff Tarkin\par Grand Moff Tarkin (V)

Lore: Imperial stormtroopers adopt strict security measures. Excellent communications and sheer numbers can hinder Rebel movement across entire territories.
Gametext: May deploy as a 'react' to a site. Each other stormtrooper present is power +1. Rebels are deploy +1 to same site.
Information: Original card: Full Scale Alert.\par \par Original concept by Phillip Gladney.

Characteristics: Female \b bounty hunter\b0, Black Sun agent, Clawdite
Lore: Female Clawdite \b bounty hunter\b0.
Gametext: Adds 2 to the power of anything she pilots. If alone, draws one battle destiny if unable to otherwise. If opponent's leader just lost from same site, opponent loses 2 Force. If just lost, may search your Force Pile and take any one card into hand; reshuffle.
Information: Original card: Rodian

Gametext: Deploy on table. Once per game, may take Finalizer into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. Once per character, when you deploy Hux, Kylo, Phasma, or Snoke to a battleground, may take any one card from Used Pile into hand; reshuffle. (Immune to Alter)
Information: This card has an Episode VII icon.\par \par Original card: Debris Zone\par \par Original concept by Justin Desai.
IsPulled: Twi'lek Advisor\par We Must Accelerate Our Plans

Lore: The Empire is able to quickly relocate its manpower, deploying its troops as efficiently as possible.
Gametext: Deploy on table. Once per turn, may cancel a Force drain by placing here from hand a non-unique First Order stormtrooper. Your cards here may deploy as if from hand (if Effect canceled by opponent, any characters here may immediately deploy for free).
Information: This card has an Episode VII icon\par \par Original card: Strategic Reserves\par \par Den Of Thieves has same functionality for non-unique aliens.\par -----\par Dreaded Imperial Starfleet has same functionality for non-unique strfighters.\par -----\par Where Are Those Droidekas?! has similar functionality for non-unique destroyer droids.
IsPulled: Twi'lek Advisor\par We Must Accelerate Our Plans
Rules: (Errata) Only non-unique First Order stormtroopers can be placed on this Effect.

Gametext: USED: Cancel the game text of a character of ability < 5 present with Kylo for remainder of turn.\par LOST: If a battle was just initiated where there are no smugglers, take the first weapons segment action (or first two if you initiated).
Information: Original card: Collateral Damage.

Gametext: Unless your Resistance character or Resistance starship here, you may not draw more than one battle destiny here.      Your First Order starships move from here for free.
LightSideText: Unless your Resistance character or Resistance starship here, you may not draw more than one battle destiny here.
DarkSideText: Your First Order starships move from here for free.
Information: This card has an Episode VII icon
IsPulled: Jakku: Landing Site\par Kuat Drive Yards (V)\par Neimoidian Advisor

Gametext: Once per turn, if your First Order character here, may deploy a Jakku battleground from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.
DarkSideText: Once per turn, if your First Order character here, may deploy a Jakku battleground from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.
Information: This card has an Episode VII icon.\par \par Original card: Tatooine: Jawa Camp (Dark)

Gametext: May add 6 pilots, 8 passengers and 4 [First Order] starfighters. Permanent pilot provides ability of 2. Deploys -4 to [Episode VII] systems and adds 1 to your force drains there. Immune to attrition < 5.
Icons: First Order, Scomp Link, Pilot, Astromech
Information: This card has an Episode VII icon.\par \par Original card: Executor.

Gametext: May add 1 pilot and 3 passengers. Permanent pilot provides ability of 2. May deploy to exterior sites. When deployed, may deploy Kylo aboard (deploy -2) from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. Takes off and lands for free.
Icons: First Order, Scomp Link, Pilot, Astromech
Information: This card has an Episode VII icon.\par \par Original card: Lambda-class Shuttle
IsPulled: You Know What I've Come For

Gametext: Deploy on your First Order warrior. May target a character or vehicle for free. Draw destiny. Add 1 if fired by a stormtrooper. Target hit, and may not be used to satisfy attrition, if destiny > defense value.
Information: This card has an Episode VII icon.\par \par Original card: Imperial Blaster
Rules: This card recieved an errata on 16.11.2016:\par http://www.starwarsccg.org/wp/current-erratas-unlimited-shields/\par \par (it no longer fires at adjacent sites)

Gametext: Deploy on Kylo. May add 1 to Force drain where present. May target a character or creature for free. Draw two destiny. If total destiny > defense value, target hit, its forfeit = 0, and both players lose 1 Force.
Information: This card has an Episode VII icon.\par \par Original card: Han Seeker.
IsPulled: I Will Finish What You Started\par Maul Strikes

Lore: Sometimes a missing person is found by the wrong search party.
Gametext: During your control phase, if your bounty hunter or Trandoshan is escorting a non-frozen captive at a battleground site you control, opponent loses 1 Force.  OR If your bounty hunter or Trandoshan just captured a character, opponent loses 1 Force. (Immune to Sense)
Information: Original card: Hunting Party.\par \par Original concept by Peter Hansen.
Combo: Hunting Party + Sandwhirl\par First you spin them around, then you bag them.\par -----\par Hunting Party + Skiffs\par As the missing people will be in the desert, most likely, you'll need some cheap, fast landspeed to shuttle your bounty hunters around in.

Lore: Ubrikkian sail barge. Custom built for Jabba with an armored hull and weaponry. Top speed of 100 kph. Used by the Hutt crimelord on his many trips to Mos Eisley.
Gametext: May add 1 alien driver and 8 passengers. Your vehicle weapons deploy free aboard. Once per turn, may deploy Passenger Deck or a skiff here from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. While on Tatooine with a skiff, Force drain +1 here.
Information: Original card: Jabba's Sail Barge.\par \par Original concept by Tom Haid
Pulls: Jabba's Sail Barge: Passenger Deck\par Racing Skiff\par Skiff

Gametext: Unless your Resistance character or Resistance starship here, you may not draw more than one battle destiny here.      Your First Order starships move from here for free.
LightSideText: Resistance characters are each defense value and forfeit +1 here.
DarkSideText: First Order characters are each power +1 here.
Information: This card has an Episode VII icon.\par \par Original card: Tatooine: Lars' Moisture Farm (Dark)
